reviewText: In the beginning it was a little hard because we both are in our late 60's but it does get a little easier if you go at it every day just a little at a time.  Soon we are going to try the next one.

Would be better if the instructor wasn't so handsy and being creepy. That part is kinda distracting, but overall great session. Second DVD is just the instructor in the woods in Hawaii with poorer quality and lackluster camera work. I was hoping for gorgeous scenery with it filmed in Hawaii. It feels like you've been snuck off to someplace your uncle can get naked to do yoga.
I had only done yoga in an organized class years ago.  This is a workout that I can do immediately and feel good afterwards.  It is sexy and useful.
This is an enjoyable alternative to hitting the gym, and boy to I need stretching out.
